description: LuminousMothis a Chinese-speaking cyber espionage group that has been active since at least October 2020.LuminousMothhas targeted high-profile organizations, including government entities, in Myanmar, the Philippines, Thailand, and other parts of Southeast Asia. Some security researchers have concluded there is a connection betweenLuminousMothandMustang Pandabased on similar targeting and TTPs, as well as network infrastructure overlaps.[1][2]
